tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE packaging_transportation_analysis (
  package_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_type VARCHAR(255),
  transportation_method VARCHAR(255),
  carbon_footprint DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    method_id INT,
    mode_id INT,
    impact_value DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES packaging_methods(method_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (mode_id) REFERENCES transportation_modes(mode_id)
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_transportation (
  package_id INT,
  method_id INT,
  amount_transported DECIMAL(10,2),
  FOREIGN KEY (package_id) REFERENCES packaging_method(package_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (method_id) REFERENCES transportation_method(method_id)
);

CREATE TABLE shipment_details (
    shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    shipment_date DATE NOT NULL,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    method_id INT NOT NULL,
    shipment_cost DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);
